INSERT INTO auth( user_id, auth ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{auth} )
mapper.select: SELECT users.*, auth.* FROM users INNER JOIN auth ON users.user_id = auth.user_id WHERE auth.auth = 'ROLE_USER' AND users.user_id NOT IN (SELECT user_id FROM auth WHERE auth = 'ROLE_ADMIN');
